## ZCurve.split() method

Decomposes given Z index into individual bit patterns, one per dimension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
split(z: bigint, out?: bigint[]): bigint[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  z | <code>bigint</code> |  |
|  out | <code>bigint[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`bigint[]`
